text: Pentethylcyclanone is an antitussive medication. ==Synthesis== Pentethylcyclanone can be prepared by alkylation of the anion of the self- condensation product of cyclopentanone with N-(2-chloroethyl)-morpholine. (1959), Ciba Geigy Cyclexanone synthesis ==References== Category:Expectorants Category:Morpholines Category:Cyclopentanes
title: Pentethylcyclanone
